      • startWork

        public static void startWork(android.app.Application application,
                             KeepLive.RunMode runMode,
                             ForegroundNotification foregroundNotification,
                             KeepLiveService keepLiveService)
        启动保活
        参数:
        application - your application
        foregroundNotification - 前台服务 必须要，安卓8.0后必须有前台通知才能正常启动Service
        keepLiveService - 保活业务
